name: The Cemetery Slasher
description:
A Short top-down puzzle game that's inspired by the lore of the Touhou Franchise. Navigate through the cemetery. Avoid the ones that are trying to prevent your happiness. 

One hit and you're gone. 

CONTROLS

  __ 

Youmu 

WASD = up, down, left, right (movement)

 SPACEBAR = Attack

 Myon 

MOUSE (movement) RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON = Shield Ability

 music used: 

Something scary is behind us by Paweł Feszczuk
